history.text: Morgan Freeman is a great actor to play the role of God.
Yes he was
But Bruce played a perfect role about a how human thinks about god
Most important thing i saw is that the prayer has to be made in the correct so that god can answer
Man having the chance to be God for a week is an eye-opener... it shows how difficult the role actually is
I agree... prayer does have to be made in the correct way
yes
we are only a creation and we cannot imagine how a creator works
agreed
that is beyond comprehension
i never realized how low of a rating this movie received from movie critics overall.
the movie shows how  a desire and lust , all these things can make you a slave of this world
yes that is poor
the movie was funny, entertaining and with proper theme
It just hit me that Steve Carell was in this movie... I guess when I saw it in 2003 it didn't stand out to me. I have only seen it once.
i saw this about 3-4 times
Very funny movie. Also has a great cast!
one of the hillarious things happened when he was presenting a news and bruce made some sentences for him to read
I was rolling on the floor
yeah every character was nice
The movie has more substance to it than a lot of comedy movies today... it actually has a good meaning to the base of the story, its not just about the laughs
humour can send you a lot of messages and perhaps through laughter you can send some powerful messages across the world
i agree
Yes, I agree.
It also shows us how unanswered prayers or getting a "no" to our prayers is sometimes for the best even though we don't realize it. Albeit, in a comedic way.
This is probably one of my fave roles jim carrey has played
Sometimes we don't see the whole picture of our life because we do not have the knowledge about the future and we start complaining about the things that why our prayers not getting answered
but there is a wisdom behind it and just like the picture shows that every prayer cannot have yes otherwise the problems will be there
which was fact for me in this movie
yes, i agree
yes agreed
The character of Morgan Freeman was nice and deep
it was so relaxed of him
It was. I love Morgan Freeman's voice... that is what made him perfect in the role for me.
Also I liked that Bruce and Grace ended up together at the end of the movie.
yeah there is always a happy ending in our life
I liked that his prayer for Grace to find someone to make her happy ended up being him.
that makes you feel good about it
yes, for the most part I agree
absolutely
the choice of name was perfect for the movie
Grace
Yes, it was. Lots of hidden meanings all throughout the movie
The one thing I learned that you have to surrender your will to god
and thats how you are going to find true happiness
a job will not make you happy
or any other worldly things if you are not surrendering your will to god

I agree. We don't know enough about what is actually going on the be able to control our lives. To truly be happy we have to surrender to God and allow him to guide us and direct us. Otherwise our lives will be chaos and we will always be searching for something that we can never find.
exactly
so the things that we should be asking God is not the job i want , want the house that i want , etc. it is the guidance that we should be asking to him and the movie shows  a glimpse of it
especially bruce makes it clear at the end by taking the job that he did not wanted.
The movie showed about the how the prayers are made at the end not for yourself but how to ask good about your loved ones and other people
Susan Ortega was a nice character to show how a man can go for his lust

And even though he didn't want that job, now he realized he was meant to have it and took more pleasure in it. Sometimes it us that preventing us from enjoying something or getting along with someone,etc. We need to change ourselves and our attitudes and then the way we see things change... it isn't always the surroundings or the circumstances that need to change.
I agree she was
agreed
The movie should not have got this low rating
even today it would have been a higher rating
I think that it was a great movie but sadly I don't think the rating would be much higher because it is becoming more and more taboo to talk about God let alone a movie be all about him
yeah but and 6.5-7  would have been good
but because of the comdey genre, i think it got less
that is true. typically it seems that only the "oscar worthy" movies get good ratings from critics
agreed
ok it was great talking with you about the movie
it was great talking to you also
